verbs.description: Evgeny Freidman , a longtime associate of Trump lawyer Michael Cohen , [V: will] cooperate with state or federal investigators as part of a plea deal , say sources .

[ARG0: Evgeny Freidman , a longtime associate of Trump lawyer Michael Cohen ,] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: cooperate] [ARG1: with state or federal investigators] [ARGM-ADV: as part of a plea deal] , say sources .
Evgeny Freidman , a longtime associate of Trump lawyer Michael Cohen , will cooperate with state or federal investigators as part of a plea deal , [V: say] [ARG0: sources] .
